metadata.title: BORKIN Back Seat Extender for Dogs, Seat Bridge for Dogs, Padded Pet Car Barrier, Removable and Washable, Water Resistant, Ideal for Trucks, SUVs, and Full Sized Sedans
features: Bridge the Gap Between Front and Rear seat: The platform bridge features a solid, rigid base that maximizes backseat space for pets; the panels can be folded to accommodate for extra passengers or storage, fits backseat areas 26.5in x 54in and larger.
Soft Extended Platform - Built with PP hollow sheets interior, wrapped with comfortable foam padding and made by heavy-duty oxford cloth, Relieve the fatigue of pets during long-distance travel.

SEAT PROTECTION: The car seat platform covers the seats, backrest, and even the floor when fully installed; this wide coverage design helps keep the inside of your car free from pet-related stains and debris.

SECURITY: The backseat platform comes with fastening straps that loop around headrests; there are also small openings for seat belts that can be used to securely tether your pet onto the bridge，keeps rowdy pets from scrambling up to the front seats and becoming a hazardous distraction to drivers.
EASY CARE: The coated 100% polyester fabric is easy to clean . Use the zipper system, you also can select disassembly and cleaning.
description: Whether you’re headed to the mountains or a travel, you and your pet will love the comfort and stability of BORKIN’s innovative Universal Multipurpose Travel Barrier Seat Cover for Dogs w/ Padded Platform Backseat Bridge Extender Base & Carry Bag. This 2-in-1 design combines the benefits of a car seat cover with the safety of a travel barrier to help prevent dangerous distractions while driving. Unlike traditional "hammock" designs, BORKIN’s deluxe seat protector features an innovative, rigid base that spans the width of a vehicle’s "back seat" area to provide a stable "floor" for your pet. This not only maximizes the back seat space but provides better "footing" for your pet, increasing their sense of security and allowing them to sit back and enjoy the ride wherever the roads might lead! The coated 100% polyester fabric is easy to clean, durable and will protect your vehicle’s upholstery from dirt, mud and moisture.
